pos_mean_info_list.mean: 支持的；辅助性的；次要的
可支持的；可援助的；可忍耐的

word_mean_info__list.difference: 最普通用词，可以与aid和assistance换用。help强调使受助者达到目的或侧重受助者对帮助的需要。
强调在迫切需要时给予支持或鼓励。
正式用词，通常指帮助完成不太重要的那一部分工作。
比help正式，侧重受助者处于困难或危险境地急需救助。
含义广泛，多指在道义上或物质上支持某人，也可指对某项事业的支持。
侧重指连续不断的支持。
通常指对论点、行动、事业等的强有力支持。
既可指积极努力对陷入困境者的支持，也可指给某人在行动、道义或信仰上的支持。
多指通过写文章或发表演说等来支持或拥护，往往暗示提倡某事或为某事辩护。

word_group.brief_definition: 支助小组；支助集团；支援小组
财政支持；财务支助；金融支持
公共支持；公众支持；公众的支持
社会支持；社会支援；社会支撑
生命维持；致残后（或在艰难环境中）生命机能的维持；医院里用于维持生命的器械
支持性价格；保障性价格

bilingual.source: She is grateful for her family's support.

bilingual.target: 你的父母支持你的梦想吗？

bilingual.source: Karen provided me with trust and support.
bilingual.target: 凯伦给了我信任和支持。

bilingual.source: How do your family members support each other?
bilingual.target: 你的家人如何互相支持？

bilingual.source: Your friends and families might support you.
bilingual.target: 你的朋友和家人可能会支持你。

bilingual.source: I'm very thankful for their support, she says.
bilingual.target: 她说，我非常感谢他们的支持。

bilingual.source: Many inspired people gave him their support.
bilingual.target: 许多受到启发的人给予了他支持。

bilingual.source: When did your family members support each other?
bilingual.target: 你的家人什么时候互相支持的？

bilingual.source: Give examples or reasons to support those points.
bilingual.target: 给出例子或理由来支持这些观点。

list.abstract: 语法标注解释 support英音：[sə'pɔ:t]美音：[sə'port]
网络游戏英雄联盟英雄的一种分类，简称SUP(全称support)。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, do you support this?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那你支持她吗？

yingyinNormal.en: We may have support now...
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们现在虽然获得支持……

yingyinNormal.en: It might be good for you to have some support.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有人支持你，或许是好事。

yingyinNormal.en: Because your husband doesn't have the support.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为你丈夫没有获得支持。

yingyinNormal.en: No, I mean, I just can't support this bill.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，我，我没法支持这项法案。

yingyinNormal.en: To support the president in the path that he's chosen.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是支持总统的选择。

yingyinNormal.en: You said I wouldn't have to support this bill.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你说我不必支持这个法案的。

yingyinNormal.en: Of course, I need the support of our region's governors.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然，我需要省事们的支持。

yingyinNormal.en: If it continues, they may not support this merger.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果继续这样，他们可能不再支持合并。

yingyinNormal.en: We want to support, guide, and reinforce your efforts.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们希望支持和引领大家的努力，并使之更加有效。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《艾玛·沃特森达沃斯世界经济论坛HeForShe演讲》

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sure your parents will support whatever choice you make.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我相信无论你们选择如何，父母都会支持的。

yingyinNormal.en: And I support you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那我支持你哦。

yingyinNormal.en: And you support this notion? Of course he does. He put your name forward as replacement.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你支持吗？他当然支持了，是他提名的你做继任者。

yingyinNormal.en: But if you do run, sir, you won't have our support.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但如果您决定参选，恕我们不能支持您。

yingyinNormal.en: It'll be very hard for Anna to lose his support at this time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果现在失去他的支持，安娜会很不好受。

yingyinNormal.en: You're not being fair. I will support you whatever you decide, just as Cora will and Robert.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你这么说就不对了，无论你怎么决定，我都会支持你，柯拉和罗伯特也都会支持你的。

yingyinNormal.en: I would love your support, Jackie, but I offer you nothing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想要你的支持，杰姬，但我什么条件也不开。

yingyinNormal.en: But if I'm being asked to support it, you know the sort of hot water...
yingyinNormal.zh: 但如果要求我支持它，我很难做...

yingyinNormal.en: My foundation has already issued a statement in support of books. Sir?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的基金会已经发布了声明表示支持出版业。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, fine. Just please come and support Mike. You don't have to sing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，就过来支持麦克就好了，你不需要唱歌。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 支持; 帮助; 资助

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 财政支持；财务支助；金融支持
公共支持；公众支持；公众的支持
社会支持；社会支援；社会支撑

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 支持的；辅助性的；次要的
n. 拥护者；支持者；手持盾牌的动物；运动队的拥护追随者

word_family.mean: v. 支撑；支持；提供帮助；使能够起作用；支持（程序；语言；装置的）运行；鼓励；维持

sense_info_list.zh: 支持; 帮助; 资助

examination_example.sentence: Children may face serious difficulties in coping with significant moves, especially if it removes them from their current school or <highlight>support</highlight> system.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 儿童在应对重大搬迁时可能面临严重的困难，特别是如果搬迁使他们离开现有的学校或支持系统。

examination_example.sentence: That common-sense change enjoys wide public <highlight>support</highlight> and would save the USPS $2 billion per year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一符合常理的改变广受公众支持，每年将为美国邮政署节省20亿美元。

examination_example.sentence: Enlist the <highlight>support</highlight> of professionals and share with them your goals and context.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 争取专业人士的支持，并与他们分享你的目标和背景。

sense_info_list.en: provide evidence for, help to show that something is true; evidence that helps to show that something is true or correct

examination_example.sentence: The only previous study analyzing causality, based on an area in Mexico that had instituted CCTs, <highlight>supported</highlight> the traditional view.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此前唯一一项分析因果关系的研究证实了传统观点，该研究于墨西哥一个实施有条件现金转移支付的地区开展。

examination_example.sentence: Where is the evidence to <highlight>support</highlight> such alarmist advice?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 支持这种危言耸听的建议的证据在哪里？

examination_example.sentence: "Eye contact and smile" can signal availability and confidence, a common-sense notion <highlight>supported</highlight> in studies by psychologist Monica Moore.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “眼神交流和微笑”可以表示有空和自信，这是心理学家Monica Moore的研究所证实的常识性概念。

sense_info_list.en:
perform in a pop or rock concert before the main performer; 
a band or singer who performs in a pop or rock concert before the main performer

word_usage.usage: support作名词指“支持、拥护、赞助、帮助”时，是不可数名词，指“支撑物、支柱”时，是可数名词。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 资助; 赡养; 帮助; 援助
支撑物; 支柱; 支座

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 拥护者；支持者；手持盾牌的动物；运动队的拥护追随者

word_family.mean: v. 支撑；支持；提供帮助；使能够起作用；支持（程序；语言；装置的）运行；鼓励；维持

sense_info_list.en: provide everything necessary, especially money, so that someone or something can live or exist; give or be ready to give help to someone if they need it
sense_info_list.zh: 资助; 赡养; 帮助; 援助

examination_example.sentence: One suggestion from the commission is a network of teacher-led "creativity collaboratives", with the aim of <highlight>supporting</highlight> teaching for creativity through the school curriculum.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该委员会的一项建议是（建立）一个由教师领导的“创造力协作”网络，旨在通过学校课程支持创造性教学。

examination_example.sentence: An upward movement of nutrient-rich sea <highlight>supports</highlight> a huge abundance of marine life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个上涨的，营养丰富的海洋，它养育着大量的海洋生物。

examination_example.sentence: More than $100 billion in funding has been put on the table for <highlight>supporting</highlight> developing nations to reduce emissions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为支持发展中国家的减排工作，已有1000多亿美金的资金投入。

sense_info_list.en: like a particular sports team, watch their games, or others

examination_example.sentence: It would need <highlight>support</highlight> from the general public.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它需要公众的支持。

examination_example.sentence: Decrease <highlight>support</highlight> from food scientists.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 减少来自食品科学家的支持。

examination_example.sentence: Smartphones might transform the way we live and work: by offering insights into human psychology and behavior and, thus, <highlight>supporting</highlight> smarter social science.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是智能手机可能改变我们生活和工作方式：通过提供对人类心理和行为的见解，从而支持更智能的社会科学的方式。

examination_example.sentence: It's actually a kind of <highlight>support</highlight> because it's offered in the spirit of helping us improve.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那实际上是一种支持，因为它是以帮助我们进步的精神提供的。

sense_info_list.en:
provide evidence for, help to show that something is true;
evidence that helps to show that something is true or correct

examination_example.sentence: Schellenberg had long been skeptical of the science <highlight>supporting</highlight> claims that music education enhances children's abstract reasoning, math, or language skills.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 长期以来，Schellenberg一直对音乐教育能提高儿童的抽象推理、数学或语言技能的说法的科学依据持怀疑态度。

sense_info_list.en: a thing that holds something and prevents it from falling
sense_info_list.zh: 支撑物; 支柱; 支座

examination_example.sentence: They hope to reduce both the number of components needed in a construction job and their weight—by replacing solid <highlight>supports</highlight> with hollow tubes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们希望减少建筑工作中需要的部件数量和重量——比如用空心管代替实心支架。

word_usage.usage: support表示“支持，赞成”时为及物动词，后面很少跟that从句。
support做名词“支持”时不可数，在give support、require support、in support等表达中，support前不可加a或the。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 资助; 赡养; 帮助; 援助
扮演(角色); (担任)配角; 助演

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 拥护者；支持者；手持盾牌的动物；运动队的拥护追随者

word_family.mean: v. 支撑；支持；提供帮助；使能够起作用；支持（程序；语言；装置的）运行；鼓励；维持

sense_info_list.en: like a particular sports team; watch their games; or others

examination_example.sentence: Win national <highlight>support</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 赢得国家的支持。

examination_example.sentence: It is proof that taxes on sugary drinks can win substantial <highlight>support</highlight> outside super-liberal areas.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这证明，对含糖饮料征税可以在超级自由主义地区之外赢得大量支持。

examination_example.sentence: What we really need at a policy level is to decide where the money will come from to help <highlight>support</highlight> good quality local green spaces.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在政策层面上，我们真正需要的是决定资金来源，以帮助和支持高质量的当地绿地。

sense_info_list.en: provide everything necessary; especially money; so that someone or something can live or exist; give or be ready to give help to someone if they need it
sense_info_list.zh: 资助; 赡养; 帮助; 援助

examination_example.sentence: For more than a decade, FedEx has <highlight>supported</highlight> the American Red Cross in its effort to get emergency supplies to areas affected by disasters, both domestically and internationally.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 十多年来，联邦快递一直支持美国红十字会向国内和国际受灾地区运送紧急救援物资。

examination_example.sentence: Many students drop out of online courses because of the lack of teaching <highlight>support</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于缺乏教学支持，许多学生放弃了在线课程。

examination_example.sentence: Many countries need <highlight>support</highlight> to improve their people's livelihood.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多国家需要支持来改善人民的生活。

examination_example.sentence: If you want to reduce boredom and increase your sense of meaning, find a cause you can <highlight>support</highlight> with your time and talent.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你想减少无聊并增强意义感，那就找一份既占用你时间又能发挥你才能的工作。

examination_example.sentence: At the minimum, most of us work because we want to be able to <highlight>support</highlight> ourselves, our families, and the people around us.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 至少，我们大多数人工作是因为我们希望能够养活自己、家人和身边的人。

sense_info_list.en:
provide evidence for; help to show that something is true; 
evidence that helps to show that something is true or correct

perform in a pop or rock concert before the main performer; 
a band or singer who performs in a pop or rock concert before the main performer
sense_info_list.zh: 扮演(角色); (担任)配角; 助演

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 拥护者；支持者；手持盾牌的动物；运动队的拥护追随者

word_family.mean: v. 支撑；支持；提供帮助；使能够起作用；支持（程序；语言；装置的）运行；鼓励；维持

sense_info_list.en: provide everything necessary, especially money, so that someone or something can live or exist; give or be ready to give help to someone if they need it
sense_info_list.zh: 资助; 赡养; 援助

examination_example.sentence: Financial <highlight>support</highlight> for travel
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对旅行的经济资助

examination_example.sentence: He was very upset that he couldn't earn enough money to <highlight>support</highlight> his family.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他很沮丧，因为他赚不到足够的钱来养家。

examination_example.sentence: Wish pacificorganzier.org to find various ways you can <highlight>support</highlight> Pacific Science Center.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 祝愿pacificorganzier.org找到多种援助太平洋科学中心的方法。

sense_info_list.en: like a particular sports team, watch their games, or others

examination_example.sentence: Mohan is cautious about this approach, yet she <highlight>supports</highlight> the purpose behind these digital beings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Mohan对这种方法持谨慎态度，但她支持这些数字生物产生的目的。

examination_example.sentence: Hopefully, all of that is designed to <highlight>support</highlight> humans in their goals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 希望所有这些都是为了支持人类实现他们的目标。

examination_example.sentence: More and more students are taking a gap year to earn money to <highlight>support</highlight> their study for the degree.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 越来越多的学生选择间隔年来赚钱以支持他们的学业，获得学位。

sense_info_list.en: provide evidence for, help to show that something is true; evidence that helps to show that something is true or correct

examination_example.sentence: Popular beliefs regarding emotional intelligence run far ahead of what research can reasonably <highlight>support</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关于情商的普遍观点远远超出了现有研究可以合理支持的范围。

examination_example.sentence: You need a seat which <highlight>supports</highlight> your back and the book should be at the right distance from your eyes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你需要一个能支撑你背部的座位，书本应与你的眼睛保持适当距离。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 支持; 帮助; 资助; 赡养
(公司向客户提供的)技术支持

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 支持的；辅助性的；次要的

word_family.mean: v. 支撑；支持；提供帮助；使能够起作用；支持（程序；语言；装置的）运行；鼓励；维持

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 支助小组；支助集团；支援小组

sense_info_list.zh: 支持; 帮助; 资助; 赡养

examination_example.sentence: He intended to rob a poor woman of her land, her only stay and <highlight>support</highlight> after her husband died.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他打算抢走一个贫穷女人的土地；她丈夫死后，这块地是她唯一的依靠和支持。

examination_example.sentence: At present, the girl is able to <highlight>support</highlight> the home with her weak shoulder.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在，这个女孩能用她瘦弱的肩膀撑起这个家。

sense_info_list.en:
provide evidence for, help to show that something is true;
evidence that helps to show that something is true or correct

examination_example.sentence: Find some key examples to <highlight>support</highlight> the "big idea".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 找一些关键的例子来证实这个“大创意”。

examination_example.sentence: Medical evidence also <highlight>supports</highlight> the idea that each person has a body clock that helps to decide his or her sleep pattern.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 医学证据也证实这个观点，即每个人都有一个生物钟来帮助决定自己的睡眠模式。

examination_example.sentence: There is no evidence (证据) to really <highlight>support</highlight> this.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 实际上，没有证据证实这一点。

examination_example.sentence: It's easy to find an inexpensive trampoline, but it should be well made and strong enough to <highlight>support</highlight> your weight.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 找到一个便宜的蹦床很容易，但是它应该制作精良，并且结实到足够支撑你的体重。

examination_example.sentence: When you cut the string, it could not <highlight>support</highlight> the kite.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你剪断绳子时，它无法支撑风筝。

examination_example.sentence: It is a planet that could <highlight>support</highlight> life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一个可以维持生命的星球。

examination_example.sentence: He also drove all the way from Poland to Italy to lend <highlight>support</highlight> for the girls during the 2014 Women's World Volleyball Championship.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2014年世界女排锦标赛期间，他还一路从波兰驱车前往意大利，为这些女孩提供支持。

examination_example.sentence: He has <highlight>supported</highlight> the Chinese team from the start.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他从一开始就支持中国队。

examination_example.sentence: How did Jozef come to Italy to <highlight>support</highlight> the Chinese Women's Volleyball Team?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 约瑟夫是如何来到意大利支持中国女排的？

sense_info_list.en: technical help that a company gives to customers using their computers or other products
sense_info_list.zh: (公司向客户提供的)技术支持

examination_example.sentence: She asked her brother Charlie, whose nickname is "Tech <highlight>Support</highlight>", to find such an app.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她让她的哥哥查理，其昵称为“技术支持”，去找到这样一款应用。

word_usage.usage: support表示“支持，赞成”时为及物动词，后面很少跟that从句。
support做名词“支持”时不可数，在give support、require support、in support等表达中，support前不可加a或the。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 最普通用词，指积极地为他人提供物质、精神或其他方面的帮助，主语可以是人或物。
强调在迫切需要时给予支持或鼓励。
